meanings.definition: Resembling a goat in smell or taste.
meanings.sent1: The cheese had a goaty flavor that reminded me of the farm.
meanings.sent2: The goaty smell of the barn filled the air.
meanings.sent3: I wrinkled my nose at the goaty scent coming from the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The soup had a goaty taste that made me think of grazing goats.
meanings.sent5: The goaty aroma of the field brought back memories of the countryside.

meanings.sent1: Her stubbornness was as goaty as a mountain goat.
meanings.sent2: The goaty behavior of the child made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent3: He put on a goaty expression when asked to clean his room.
meanings.sent4: The old man's goaty beard added to his wise appearance.
meanings.sent5: The goaty antics of the goat made the children giggle.

meanings.definition: Smelling or tasting like a goat.
meanings.sent1: The milk had a goaty aftertaste that lingered on my tongue.
meanings.sent2: The goaty odor in the room was overwhelming.
meanings.sent3: She made a face at the goaty flavor of the curry.
meanings.sent4: The cheese had a goaty tang that was surprisingly delicious.
meanings.sent5: The goaty scent of the barnyard brought back childhood memories.
